name: iconpeak
description: IconPeak is a leading mobile advertising platform. They build apps from scratch, monetize existing ones and acquire audiences for top app developers. As a TUNE Certified Partner, the company helps advertisers such as Machine Zone, Science Inc. and Elex Tech to discover new users; be it through social media influencers, native placements or video ads. They also offer monetization solutions for developers looking to drive revenue through their apps.
